plot: Extreme By Design, an hour-long documentary film, follows a band of idealistic young Californians who, using a radical new design approach, make life-changing products for the world's poor.
title: Extreme by Design
plot_es: Extreme By Design, an hour-long documentary film, follows a band of idealistic young Californians who, using a radical new design approach, make life-changing products for the world's poor.
plot_en: Extreme By Design, an hour-long documentary film, follows a band of idealistic young Californians who, using a radical new design approach, make life-changing products for the world's poor.
